overview: The play revolves around a successful lawyer named Mourad, married to Susann, whom he trusts blindly. Abla comes to visit her friend Sawsan to complain about the actions of her husband, Raafat, the author of the series, questioning her husband's behavior and betraying her. Differences between Murad and Susann after her knowledge of his date with Ismat and events follow in a dramatic drama.
title: مسرحية القضيه رقم واحد
